text: Tibor Herczegfalvy (born 17 March 1954) is a Hungarian equestrian. He competed at the 1992 Summer Olympics and the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Hungarian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Hungary Category:Equestrians at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:People from Békés County
title: Tibor Herczegfalvy
